Member Function Documentation

bool BulletExt::BulletExt::ExtData::DamageOccupants (  ) 

Does the entire PassThrough logic, checks & damage.

This function determines whether the projectile should pass through the outter shell of a building and damage the occupants instead.

If so, it proceeds to damage the occupants, and then returns true. If the projectile did not pass through, and the building has to be damaged according to normal rules. the function returns false.

Returns:
true if the bullet passed through and the damage case was handled, otherwise false.
Author:
Renegade
Date:
02.12.09+

00036                 BulletTypeExt::ExtData* TheBulletTypeExt = BulletTypeExt::ExtMap.Find(TheBullet->Type);
00037                 BuildingTypeExt::ExtData* BuildingAresData = BuildingTypeExt::ExtMap.Find(Building->Type);
00038 
00039                 Debug::Log("Bullet %s is about to damage occupants of %s: occupants #%d, UC.PT = %lf\n",
00040                         TheBullet->Type->ID, Building->Type->ID, Building->Occupants.Count, BuildingAresData->UCPassThrough);
00041 
00042                 if(Building->Occupants.Count && BuildingAresData->UCPassThrough) { // only work when UCPassThrough is set, as per community vote in thread #1392
00043                         Debug::Log("SubjToTrenches = %d\n", TheBulletTypeExt->SubjectToTrenches);
00044                         if(!TheBulletTypeExt->SubjectToTrenches || ((ScenarioClass::Instance->Random.RandomRanged(0, 99) / 100.0) < BuildingAresData->UCPassThrough)) { // test for negative b/c being SubjectToTrenches means "we're getting stopped by trenches".
00045                                 int poorBastard = ScenarioClass::Instance->Random.RandomRanged(0, Building->Occupants.Count - 1); // which Occupant is getting it?
00046                                 Debug::Log("Poor Bastard #%d\n", poorBastard);
00047                                 if(BuildingAresData->UCFatalRate && ((ScenarioClass::Instance->Random.RandomRanged(0, 99) / 100.0) < BuildingAresData->UCFatalRate)) {
00048                                         Debug::Log("Fatal hit!\n");
00049                                         // fatal hit
00050                                         Building->Occupants[poorBastard]->Destroyed(TheBullet->Owner);
00051                                 } else {
00052                                         /* ReceiveDamage args:
00053                                         virtual eDamageState ReceiveDamage(int* pDamage, int DistanceFromEpicenter, WarheadTypeClass* pWH,
00054                                                 ObjectClass* Attacker, bool IgnoreDefenses, bool PreventPassengerEscape, HouseClass* pAttackingHouse) R0;
00055                                                 where
00056                                                 DistanceFromEpicenter -> used for CellSpread/PercentAtMax

00058                                         */

00060                                         // just a flesh wound
00061                                         Debug::Log("Flesh wound - health(%d) * UCDmgMult(%lf)\n", TheBullet->Health, BuildingAresData->UCDamageMultiplier);
00062                                         int adjustedDamage = static_cast<int> (ceil(TheBullet->Health * BuildingAresData->UCDamageMultiplier)); // Bullet->Health is the damage it delivers (go Westwood)
00063                                         Debug::Log("Adjusted damage = %d\n", adjustedDamage);
00064                                         int result = Building->Occupants[poorBastard]->ReceiveDamage(&adjustedDamage, 0, TheBullet->WH, TheBullet->Owner, false, true, TheBullet->GetOwningHouse());
00065                                         Debug::Log("Received damage, %d\n", result);
00066                                 }
00067                                 return true;
00068                         } else {
00069                                 return false; // no damage dealt b/c bullet was SubjectToTrenches=yes and UC.PassThrough did not apply
00070                         }
00071                 } else {
00072                         return false; // no damage dealt b/c either there were no occupants, or UC.PassThrough is set to 0
00073                 }
00074         } else {
00075                 return false; // no damage dealt b/c the building-pointer was NULL (which is concerning)
